languages.text: "Я слышу шепоты... Они зовут меня забыться долгим сном..."

traits.locale_text: "Я слышу шепоты... Они зовут меня забыться долгим сном..."

languages.text: "I hear whispers... They are telling me to embrace the long sleep..."
languages.original_text: "Я слышу шепоты... Они зовут меня забыться долгим сном..."

traits.locale_text: "I hear whispers... They are telling me to embrace the long sleep..."
"I hear whispers... They are telling me to embrace the long sleep..."

"I hear whispers... They are telling me to embrace the long sleep..."
"I hear whispers... They are telling me to embrace the long sleep..."

languages.text: “我听到了他们的低语……他们想让我进入漫长的沉睡之中……”
languages.original_text: "I hear whispers... They are telling me to embrace the long sleep..."

traits.locale_text: “我听到了他们的低语……他们想让我进入漫长的沉睡之中……”

languages.text: «Oigo susurros... quieren que me suma en un letargo eterno...».
languages.original_text: "I hear whispers... They are telling me to embrace the long sleep..."

traits.locale_text: «Oigo susurros... quieren que me suma en un letargo eterno...».

languages.text: 「ささやく声が聞こえる…惰眠をむさぼるようにと言ってくるの…」
languages.original_text: "I hear whispers... They are telling me to embrace the long sleep..."

traits.locale_text: 「ささやく声が聞こえる…惰眠をむさぼるようにと言ってくるの…」

languages.text: "Ich höre Flüstern ... Ich soll den langen Schlaf willkommen heißen ..."
languages.original_text: "I hear whispers... They are telling me to embrace the long sleep..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich höre Flüstern ... Ich soll den langen Schlaf willkommen heißen ..."

languages.text: « J'entends des murmures... Elles me disent d'accueillir le grand sommeil... »
languages.original_text: "I hear whispers... They are telling me to embrace the long sleep..."

traits.locale_text: « J'entends des murmures... Elles me disent d'accueillir le grand sommeil... »

languages.text: "Fısıltı duyuyorum... Bana uzun uzadıya uyumamı salık veriyorlar..."
languages.original_text: "I hear whispers... They are telling me to embrace the long sleep..."
